an3.59:4.1: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.59:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an3.59:4.4: “yassassu, bho gotama, yañño vā saddhaṃ vā thālipāko vā deyyadhammaṃ vā, tevijjesu brāhmaṇesu dānaṃ dadeyyā”ti.
an3.59:4.5: “Yathā kathaṃ pana, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā tevijjaṃ paññapentī”ti?
an3.59:4.6: “Idha kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena, ajjhāyako mantadharo, tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ, padako, veyyākaraṇo, lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayoti.
an3.59:4.7: Evaṃ kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā tevijjaṃ paññapentī”ti.
an3.59:5.1: “Aññathā kho, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaṃ tevijjaṃ paññapenti, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotī”ti.
an3.59:5.2: “Yathā kathaṃ pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hoti?
an3.59:5.3: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotī”ti.
an3.59:5.4: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
an3.59:5.6: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
an3.59:6.1: “Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi … pe …
an3.59:7.1: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti.
an3.59:7.4: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
an3.59:7.7: tamo vihato, āloko uppanno yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an3.59:8.1: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti.
an3.59:8.2: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena … pe …
an3.59:8.6: tamo vihato, āloko uppanno yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
an3.59:9.1: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti.
an3.59:9.6: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati, bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati, avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati;
an3.59:9.8: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
an3.59:9.11: tamo vihato, āloko uppanno yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti.
an3.59:11.1: * Pubbenivāsaṃ yo vedī,
an3.59:13.1: Evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotī”ti.
an3.59:13.2: “Aññathā, bho gotama, brāhmaṇānaṃ tevijjo, aññathā ca pana ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hoti.
an3.59:13.3: Imassa ca, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye tevijjassa brāhmaṇānaṃ tevijjo kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasiṃ.
an3.59:14.2: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
